participant_1.background:
My first purchase was a baseball glove for my son.
i like to write poetry in my spare time.
I like to play video games and go for walks with my dog Percy.
i work graveyard in a hotel.
i recently lost both my parents to an automobile accident.

participant_2.background:
I have a crib in my office, so I can keep an eye on my child while I work.
if i were to be reincarnated , i d want to come back as a hippopotamus.
i love going to concerts on the weekend.
i am a psychology major.
I want to write my own fairytales to share with my family and friends.

content.text: I'm sorry to hear about your parents. I recently lost my cat and it has been difficult.
I am so sorry to hear about your cat. I can't imagine how hard that must have been.
Thanks. I'm trying to keep my mind busy. I write poetry in my spare time.
That's great! I love to write too. I want to write my own fairytales to share with my family and friends.
That's wonderful! I would love to read them when you're finished.
Thanks! I'm still working on them, but I'll let you know when they're ready.
Great!
What do you like to do in your spare time?
I like to play video games and go for walks with my dog Percy.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love going to concerts on the weekends.
I used to go to concerts a lot when I was younger. I haven't been to one in a while.
You should go to one soon! They're always a lot of fun.
I know, I know. I'll try to go to one soon.
Good!
What are you going to school for?
I'm a psychology major.
Oh, that's interesting. What do you want to do with your degree?
I'm not sure yet. I'm thinking about going into counseling or social work.
That sounds like a great career. I'm sure you'll be great at it.
Thanks! I hope so.
I'm sure you will
